name: Kombu no tsukudani
recipeInstructions: 1. Soak the Kombu in enough water to cover it until it is soft enough to cut.
2. Reserve the water and cut into bite size pieces, and return to the water.
3. Add the vinegar and leave for at least 1 hour.
4. Add the other ingredients, bring the pan to a simmer, then lower the heat.
6. Cook until soft, shiny, caramalised, and transluscent.
